hero.core_tension: Content releases create short, intense attention windows. Operators must decide how to convert that burst into sales instead of discount leakage. The mechanism is simple.
hero.setting: Flagship bookstore interior with modular pop-up bay. Three-quarter angle, shallow depth, materials: warm wood, matte metal, frosted glass.
hero.persona: Retail operator and indie studio creative director in close collaboration.
hero.action: Final setup of branded shop vignettes while testing lighting and mobile POS. Small team directing a 30-minute in-store episode.
hero.urgency_symbol: A half-drawn curtain and stepped light markers that suggest an opening window without a clock. The leverage point sits here.
hero.lighting: Polished editorial. Confident highlights. Clean negative space and soft edge shadows.
hero.alt: Operator and studio lead arranging a branded pop-up in a flagship store mid-setup

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings for attention intensity with radial arcs for pricing levers and discrete nodes for stores. A simple diagram maps time to price and occupancy.
signal_map.motion: Flow from broad low attention to a narrow peak. Pricing compresses into the peak window. Momentum locks.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals with saturated accent on peak nodes; metallic lines for data streams; textured paper background.
signal_map.alt: Diagram of attention rings, pricing arcs, and event nodes across stores
